params.newLogicVersions: lists of the new logic versions to create.

hasLogicVersion(bytes32).return: true if the logic version is already configured. Otherwise it returns false.

params.aOwner: address of the owner of the registry.
params.initialLogicVersions: lists of the new logic versions to create.

params.previousVersion: the previous version to be used.

transferOwnership(address).details: Can only be called by the current owner.

params.newOwner: The address that should be the new owner.

params.newLogic: the new logic address to set.
params.proxy: The (optional) DynamicUpgradeable proxy address to attempt to directly upgrade.

params.newLogicVersions: lists of the new logic versions to create.

getLogicVersion(bytes32).notice: It gets the current logic version for a given logic name.

hasLogicVersion(bytes32).notice: It tests whether a logic name is already configured.

initialize(address,(address,bytes32)[]).notice: It initializes this logic versions constants.

rollbackLogicVersion(bytes32,uint256).notice: It rollbacks a logic to a previous version.

transferOwnership(address).notice: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`).

upgradeLogicVersion(bytes32,address,addr.notice: It upgrades a logic version given a logic name.

userdoc.notice: It manages all the logic contract versions, mapping each one to a logic name (or key).
